revisions.name: JAMF Now
revisions.title: JAMF Now
revisions.body:
Mobile Device Management (MDM)

JAMFNow is an industry leader in Mobile Device Management or MDM.

Given the use of Google Workspace and the high cost of any Microsoft option, the Intune service would not be acceptable.

The need for an MDM is a key infrastrucutre support element for any organisation. The JAMFNow service provides tight integration with Google Workspace allowing it to provide both SSO and device integration capabilities.

Other systems have been reviewed, but this JAMFNow service is by far the cheapest and for the cost, good value

.

revisions.name: Signature Satori for GSuite
revisions.title: Signature Satori
revisions.body:
Exclaimer for GSuite

Signature Satori is a cloud SaaS service than enables professional email signatures across all environments.

The use of centralised signatures ensures consistant look and feel which is key to brand recognition and brand governance.

Configured centrally, Signature Satori provides a secure end-to-end encrypted service for signature management.

revisions.name: Google Workspace SSO
revisions.title: SSO Identity and Access Pattern
revisions.body:
Workspace for Single Sign On

Leveraging standard features of the Google Workspace business edition, SSO and Google iDP will be used for all SaaS based authentication and accesss control.

This pattern and standard will ensure that all access to 3rd party systems is audited and maintained centrally according to policies and groups defined in the platform.

The use of local authentication must only be granted by board level agreement

revisions.name: CloudFlare
revisions.title: CloudFlare
revisions.body:
CloudFlare

CloudFlare provides centralised WAN and SASE protection to all devices.

CloudFare is used to secure and host websites, control access to resources and provide DDoS and DNS protection for all company domains.

The CloudFlare service uses a managed VPN endpoint to encrypt and tunnel authenticated data from endpoints to the CloudFlare network globally. This authorised encryption ensures ahta all data is potentially double encrypted across both public and private networks.

The VPNs are maintained using the WARP+ VPN service that optionally allows only DNS requets be be encrypted

The use of access control and authentication combined with DNS allow and blocklist management also helps control traffic between clients and the outside world.

revisions.name: Google Workspace
revisions.title: Google Workspace
revisions.body:
Office Productivity Services

Google Workspace is a recognised leader in the Office Productivity area for new business startups needing more flexablity from the incumbant leader Microsoft.

Google Workspace provides online web only services that help maintain the footprint of the company operations to the cloud.

Using Google Workspace services and integrating all aspects into the Chrome browser experence ensures the company operations can be done on any device.

Using centrallised management of end user experence using the admin console allows rapid onboarding and offboarding of staff onto the service as needed.

This easy of management is a key reason Google Workspace was selected for the Office Productivity service.

revisions.name: Active Pieces
revisions.title: Active Pieces
revisions.body:
Active Pieces

Active Pieces is a business automation and workflow tool.

Traditional line of business systems typically have a degree of automation built into them to service common workflow activities.

However, they typically don't interact with other systems, and often manual processes are used to interact between systems.

Active Pieces allows for business processes to be automated by allowing interaction between systems, based on business rules.
